data.title: Corn Burritos weren't the same.
data.text: I visited after not having been for many years. So of course the first thing I ordered were the corn burritos. Unfortunately whoever made the sauce changed it because it was missing oregano and was super bland. It was definitely not as good as I remember growing up. Also as I was sitting in my car eating,  one of the staff was sweeping the patio and hit my car with her broom and thought nothing of it. Not cool to smack my car and look at me with a blank look!  But most of all, it's too bad that the sauce is not the same.

data.title: Best Ice Cream in Ventura
data.text: The Ice cream is AMAZING and is sometimes chocolate dipped. Overall great service and is extremely old fashioned which I like alot.

data.title: Corn burritos like no other!
data.text: Since I was in third grade (more years than I want to admit), I have enjoyed corn burritos from Foster's Freeze.  Now that I live in Michigan and make it to Ventura only a couple of times a year, it is truly a walk down memory lane and a real treat.  The shakes are great too!

data.title: A must visit while in Ventura
data.text: An Old Favorite.  Just have to have the corn burritos when in town.  Burgers are good as well, but the corn burritos are now a generational food - my son gets them when he returns from college!!!  Nothing compares to these home made corn burritos.

data.title: just like old times.
data.text: wanted an old fashion sundae, it reminded me of the good old days growing up as a kid and getting a sundae.

data.title: Beware!
data.text:
I've had the two horrible experiences with Foster's Freeze. The two times I have been there, my order had been messed up twice. Realizing this young lady messed up the order (made my son's hamburger with everything on and not plain) and did not put all of the items into my bag (accusing me of already having them), I asked her to please remake all of the melting ice cream items because they would dirty up my brand new Jeep. We had already been waiting for the remade burger for 15 minutes at this point. She just stared at me with a glare without saying anything for at least 30 seconds. She told me my son never asked for his burger plain (with a nasty attitude) and called the cashier over. The cashier acknowledged that my son DID ask for it plain. The second time I called to have my order corrected (again she stated that I never asked for the burger plain), the same young woman stated that I never specified what I wanted (blatant lie). When we picked up our corrected hamburger, there was a 4-inch dark hair tucked into it. This was the item that my 9-year-old son bit into. I cannot speak on behalf of the behavior of the other employees (who seem to be really nice), but this young woman should not be working with food. I do not know this woman's name, but she is about 5'6, thin, dark hair, acne, overgrown eyebrows, and a really really combative attitude. 

Please keep your family safe and steer clear of this place. If the woman I am speaking of feels that putting her hair into a hamburger is a dignified way of redeeming herself after making a mistake, then this is not a place you should feel safe taking your children to. 

Please feel free to email me if you have any similar horror stories. I know several avenues we can take to handle this manner.

data.title: Ice Cream on average
data.text: Nothing bad to say here. Just ordinary. Same menu for ice cream desserts as anywhere. Staff was friendly and cheerful.

data.title: Good
data.text: Corn burritos with sauce and cheese and vanilla diet pepsi - great lunch!

data.title: great local food.
data.text: been goin there since i was a kid  hmmmmm really tasty food great service small drive in feel without that big chain overseas beef .... issues thanx for keeping it open . been there since 59 a true local I con .

data.title: The worst place to eat in ventura
data.text: Terrible customer service.  Food took way to long and there was a cockroach in the wrapper of my burger.  Gross.  I tried to complain about it but the only response I got was "My dad owns this place, just try and complain."  Hmmmmm.  I dont like cockraoches with my burger so Ill pass.
